login-component.login-with-employee-id: Please login with your Employee ID.

error.credentials: Incorrect username or password. Please try again.

contact-modal.contact-support-team: If you have any problems with the application, please contact our support.

manage-invitations.title: Manage Invitations
manage-invitations.description: This function allows you to create or remove invitations for employees to create their personal corporate credential.

manage-issued-credentials.title: Manage Issued Credentials
manage-issued-credentials.description: This function allows you to see the list of employee credentials that were issued. It also provides the possibility to revoke credentials (e.g. the employee has left the company).

manage-invitation-overview-component.table-description: This list shows all invitations not yet accepted by employees.

warning-modal.title: Please confirm deletion of this invitation
warning-modal.modal-text: Are you sure you want to remove this invitation from the list?

required.company-zip-code: Company zip code field is required!

size.first-name: Maximum size of First Name is {{number}} characters!
size.last-name: Maximum size of Last Name is {{number}} characters!
size.email: Email before '@' can have maximum size of {{number}} characters!
size.id: Maximum size of ID is {{number}} characters!
size.company-name: Maximum size of Company Name is {{number}} characters!
size.company-subject: Maximum size of Company Subject is {{number}} characters!
size.company-address: Maximum size of Company Address is {{number}} characters!
size.company-zip-code: Maximum size of Company Zip Code is {{number}} characters!
size.company-city: Maximum size of Company City is {{number}} characters!

forbidden-characters.first-name: First name can only contain letters, numbers, whitespace and the following symbols: _ . & -
forbidden-characters.last-name: Last name can only contain letters, numbers, whitespace and the following symbols: _ . & -
forbidden-characters.id: ID can only contain letters, numbers and the following symbols: _ - .
forbidden-characters.company-name: Company name can only contain letters, numbers, whitespace and the following symbols: _ . & -
forbidden-characters.company-subject: Company subject can only contain letters, numbers, whitespace and the following symbols: _ . & -
forbidden-characters.company-address: Company address can only contain letters, numbers, whitespace and the following symbols: _ . & -
forbidden-characters.company-zip-code: Company zip code can only contain letters, numbers, whitespace and the following symbols: _ . & -
forbidden-characters.company-city: Company city can only contain letters, numbers, whitespace and the following symbols: _ . & -

not-unique.id: Credential with the given ID already exists.

error.invitation-already-accepted: An invitation for the given credential id has already been accepted.

manage-issued-credentials-component.table-description: Select from existing credentials to revoke them.

revoke.title: Revoke credential
revoke.modal-text: Do you really want to revoke this employee's credential?

error.size: Feedback should be between 15 and 500 characters!

page-not-found-component.go-back: Go back to the home page

error-notification: Something went wrong, please try again.
